skills.title: Front-End
skills.description: I specialize in crafting visually stunning and seamlessly functional web application. Proficient in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript and JS frameworks, I bring designs to life and ensure a user-friendly experience. From responsive layouts to interactive features, I am dedicated to creating web solutions that captivate and engage audiences.

skills.title: UX/UI Design
skills.description: I shape the digital landscape by blending creativity with functionality. My passion lies in creating intuitive and visually compelling user interfaces. From wireframes to prototypes, I meticulously design every detail to enhance user satisfaction. I believe in the power of user-centric design to transform ideas into immersive and meaningful experiences.

skills.title: Project management
skills.description: From concept to delivery, I navigate the complexities of projects, ensuring timelines, budgets, and expectations are met. My strategic approach and effective communication skills facilitate collaboration among cross-functional teams, resulting in successful digital projects that meet and exceed objectives.

philosophy.title: Continuous learning:
philosophy.description: I am constantly looking for novelty and wish to develop my professional and interpersonal skills.

philosophy.title: Open-minded:
philosophy.description: It is important to be able to adapt to each projects and to show kindness to my various colleagues and interlocutors.

philosophy.title: Help each other:
philosophy.description: I have the will to put my knowledge and my skills at the service of others.

philosophy.title: Ethics:
philosophy.description: The values that are dear to me: respect, tolerance, honesty and fairness.

portfolio.title: Sprinter Sell
portfolio.description: Sprinter Sell stands at the forefront of innovation, designed to empower sales representatives with an arsenal of tools to supercharge their efficiency and effectiveness.

portfolio.title: Creeper Corners
portfolio.description: Creeper Corners is a revolutionary platform that brings the enchanting world of Minecraft builds to your fingertips. Creeper Corners is your go-to destination for discovering and renting awe-inspiring Minecraft creations.
